Game introduction

As the most involved employee in the company, he was eventually overwhelmed and fell ill due to the long hours of overtime work... but he gave himself a short vacation.
The company hired a nurse to take care of your daily life for you, and she left a deep impression on you the first time you met her.
Her name is Ao Wei
She has red hair and tattoos. She is a beautiful woman with a gentle and caring personality. But...she seems to be a nursing sister who is dissatisfied with her desires. Can you satisfy her?
